name: One Pot Vegan Vodka Sauce Pasta from The Easy Vegan. Review + GIVEAWAY!
description: •gluten-free option* •soy-free •no added oil This has all the ease you expect from a one-pot meal. You cook the pasta right in the creamy tomato sauce, which has the barest hint of vodka and mushrooms, carrots and eggplant.
recipeIngredient: 2½ cups 8 oz rotini pasta  ((*use gluten-free pasta))
2 cups 18 oz vegan marinara sauce or Mushroom Red Pepper Pasta Sauce (page 85)

recipeInstructions.text: Add everything but the salt to a deep skillet and push the pasta underneath the liquid. Bring to a boil, then turn the heat down to medium-low and simmer until the pasta is al dente, about 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir every few minutes so everything doesn’t stick to the bottom of the pan. Cook for about 9 minutes or until the pasta is tender. The timing will vary depending on the shape and kind of pasta you use. Taste and add salt if needed.
